content: chain 1 3 double_crochet into ea chain 1 space until next corner space 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet repeat from * around rug until final corner 3 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet & join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain 5 round 2-4 chain 5 3 double_crochet in same corner space chain 1 3 double_crochet into ea chain 1 space until next corner space 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet repeat from * around rug until final corner 3 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet & join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain 5 round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet & chain 1 space around working 3 single_crochet into each corner end off weave in ends & enjoy your new rug thanks to ___________ for their test crocheting skills feel free to make as many of these as you like for local craft fairs/auctions/raffles/bazaars but please do not sell finished items online the pattern itself is not for sale if making for charity please let me know the name of the charity & include my contact info with the item anastaciaknits@gmail com / http //anastaciaknits net / anastaciaknits on ravelry if you have any questions or comments or just want small granny square rug v 4 24 11 to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits- designs thanks small granny square rug v 4 24 11
